SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT sl.* , REPLACE(s.SPL_NAME, ' ', '') SEARCH_SPL_NAME , REPLACE(s.SPL_CTGR, ' ', '') SEARCH_SPL_CTGR , REPLACE(#{searchKeyword}, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM SUPPLY_LOG sl JOIN SUPPLY s ON s.SPL_ID = sl.SPL_ID) sl WHERE sl.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND SEARCH_SPL_NAME LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'
AND SEARCH_SPL_CTGR LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT sl.SPL_LOG_ID , sl.SPL_ID , sl.REQR_ID , sl.REQ_CNT , sl.REQ_DT , sl.REQ_RSN , sl.DEL_YN , s.SPL_NAME , s.SPL_CTGR , s.SPL_PRICE , REPLACE(s.SPL_NAME, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_SPL_NAME , REPLACE(s.SPL_CTGR, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_SPL_CTGR , REPLACE(#{searchKeyword}, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM SUPPLY_LOG sl JOIN SUPPLY s ON s.SPL_ID = sl.SPL_ID) sl WHERE sl.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND SEARCH_SPL_NAME LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'
AND SEARCH_SPL_CTGR LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'
